df-nmo
blocks.content: Define the norm of an operator between two normed groups (usually vector spaces). This definition produces an operator norm function for each pair of groups ` <. s , t >. ` . Equivalent to the definition of linear operator norm in [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 39. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cnmo, cmpo(s0, s1, cngp, cngp, cmpt(s2, co(cv(s0), cghm, cv(s1)), cinf(crab(s3, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cfv(cnm, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), cle, co(cv(s3), cmul, cfv(cfv(cnm, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))), cxr, clt))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ normOp =(s0 ‚àà NrmGrp, s1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(s0[GrpHom]s1)‚Ü¶ inf({ s3 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0),((norm ` s1)`(s2 ` s4))[‚â§](s3[√ó]((norm ` s0)` s4)))}, ‚Ñù*, <)))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-nghm
blocks.content: Define the set of normed group homomorphisms between two normed groups. A normed group homomorphism is a group homomorphism which additionally bounds the increase of norm by a fixed real operator. In vector spaces these are also known as bounded linear operators. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: df-nmhm
blocks.content: Define a normed module homomorphism, also known as a bounded linear operator. This is a module homomorphism (a linear function) such that the operator norm is finite, or equivalently there is a constant ` c ` such that... (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)

  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[normOp]c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(norm ` c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c7)
} = {
  a1ii((((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c3[‚â§](c4 ` c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû),(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))‚Üí c3[‚â§]s0)))), d(s1, c3))
  sylan9bb((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c3[‚â§](c4 ` c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû),(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))‚Üí c3[‚â§]s0)), c3[‚â§]inf({ s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, ‚Ñù*, <))
  breq2d(c3, cle, (c4 ` c2), inf({ s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, ‚Ñù*, <), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)))
  nmoval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c7)
  syl6bb(c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c3[‚â§]inf({ s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, ‚Ñù*, <), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû),(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))‚Üí c3[‚â§]s0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, c3[‚â§]hs0))
  mpan(c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c3[‚â§]inf({ s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, ‚Ñù*, <)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, c3[‚â§]hs0)), { s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))} ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  sstri({ s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, cxr, (0[[,)]+‚àû))
  ssrab2(s0, (0[[,)]+‚àû), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1))))
  icossxr(nat0, cpnf)
  infxrgelb(hs0, { s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))}, c3)
  ralrab2(hs0, s0, (0[[,)]+‚àû), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1))), c3[‚â§]hs0, c3[‚â§]s0)
  breq2(hs0, s0, c3, cle)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cico, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1)))})
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((0[[,)]+‚àû))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c5,(c6 `(c2 ` s1))[‚â§](s0[√ó](c7 ` s1))))
  diff.hs0.w(c3[‚â§]s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c3, cle, hs0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

}

blocks.name: nmolb
blocks.content: Any upper bound on the values of a linear operator translates to an upper bound on the operator norm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 26-Sep-2020.)

thm nmolb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c3)), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3)))
  -| wceq(c7, co(c0, cnmo, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cnm, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
} = {
  3impib(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c3), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3)))
  syl5bir(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c3)), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  elrege0(c3)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wi(wcel(c3, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3))), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cv(hs0)))))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cfv(c7, c2)))
  xrleidd(cfv(c7, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))))
  mpdan(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wb(wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cfv(c7, c2)), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(c7, c2), cxr))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c7, c2), cxr, cinf(crab(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))), cxr, clt), w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))))
  nmoval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c7, c4, c5, c6)
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1))), wcel(cinf(crab(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(crab(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))), cxr))
  sstri(crab(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))), cxr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  ssrab2(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))))
  icossxr(nat0, cpnf)
  infxrcl(crab(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))))
  nmogelb(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(c7, c2), c7, c4, c5, c6)
  rspccv(hs0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), c3, wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cv(hs0))), wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3))
  ralbidv(s0, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))
  breq2d(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c7, c2), cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c7, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c7, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wral(s0, c4, wbr(cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cle, co(c3, cmul, cfv(c6, cv(s0))))), wbr(cfv(c7, c2), cle, c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm nmolb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1))‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß 0[‚â§]c3)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3))
  ‚ä£ c7 =(c0[normOp]c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(norm ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(norm ` c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)
} = {
  3impib((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù, 0[‚â§]c3, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3))
  syl5bir((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), (c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß 0[‚â§]c3), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3), c3 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû))
  elrege0(c3)
  syl((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), (c3 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû),(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]hs0)))
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû),(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]hs0)), (c7 ` c2)[‚â§](c7 ` c2))
  xrleidd((c7 ` c2), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)))
  mpdan((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), ((c7 ` c2)[‚â§](c7 ` c2)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû),(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]hs0))), (c7 ` c2)‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  eqeltrd((c7 ` c2), cxr, inf({ hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))}, ‚Ñù*, <), (c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)))
  nmoval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c7, c4, c5, c6)
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c2 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1)), inf({ hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))}, ‚Ñù*, <)‚àà ‚Ñù*, { hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))} ‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  sstri({ hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))}, cxr, (0[[,)]+‚àû))
  ssrab2(hs0, (0[[,)]+‚àû), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0))))
  icossxr(nat0, cpnf)
  infxrcl({ hs0 ‚àà(0[[,)]+‚àû)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))})
  nmogelb(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, (c7 ` c2), c7, c4, c5, c6)
  rspccv(hs0, (0[[,)]+‚àû), c3, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]hs0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0))), (c7 ` c2)[‚â§]hs0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0))), (c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3)
  ralbidv(s0, c4, hs0 = c3, (c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)), (c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))
  breq2d((c5 `(c2 ` s0)), cle, (hs0[√ó](c6 ` s0)), (c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)), hs0 = c3)
  oveq1(hs0, c3, cmul, (c6 ` s0))
  breq2(hs0, c3, (c7 ` c2), cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c((0[[,)]+‚àû))
  diff.hs0.c((c7 ` c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c7, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c4,(c5 `(c2 ` s0))[‚â§](c3[√ó](c6 ` s0)))‚Üí(c7 ` c2)[‚â§]c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nmolb2d
blocks.content: Any upper bound on the values of a linear operator at nonzero vectors translates to an upper bound on the operator norm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nmolb2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, c2))

  cnveqd(c3, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, cngp))))

  2fveq3(c3, cfv(c0g, c1), c5, c0)

blocks.content: The operator norm is a bound on the size of an operator, even when it is infinite (using extended real multiplication). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)

  recnd(((norm ` c0)` hs0), ((c0 ‚àà NrmGrp ‚àß c1 ‚àà NrmGrp)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs0 ‚â†(0 ` c0))))

thm nmods(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

blocks.name: isnmhm
blocks.content: A normed module homomorphism is a left module homomorphism which is also a normed group homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)

} = {
  biadanii(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnmhm, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wcel(c2, cnlm)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2))))
  elmpt2cl(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cnmhm, c2, cnlm, cnlm, cin(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cnghm, cv(hs1))))

  eleq2d(c0, co(c1, cnmhm, c2), cin(co(c1, clmhm, c2), co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wcel(c2, cnlm)))

  ineq12d(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cnghm, cv(hs1)), co(c1, clmhm, c2), co(c1, cnghm, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2, clmhm)
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2, cnghm)

  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[NMHom]c2), c3 ‚àà(c1[NMHom]c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[NGHom]c2))
  nmhmnghm(c0, c1, c2)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(c1[NMHom]c2), c3 ‚àà(c1[NMHom]c2), c3 ‚àà(c1[NGHom]c2))
  nmhmnghm(c3, c1, c2)
  nghmplusg(c2, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  isnmhm((c0[oF(c4)]c3), c1, c2)
}
